subject: Holocaust and the Nazi Era
Baseball
Jews and Judaism
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Ike Davis met with about 30 members of 3GNY, a New York City organization, and told them the story of how he came to be aware of his own family’s ordeal on his mother’s side.
snippet: The Mets’ Ike Davis met with about 30 members of 3GNY, a New York City organization, and told them the story of how he came to be aware of his own family’s ordeal on his mother’s side.
